title: JTS: short-lived maker of 90s hard drives
summary:
JT Storage, aka JTS Corporation, looks on the surface like just another 90s hard drive company that got mauled by Seagate and Western Digital. But I’d say they were significant for two reasons: Their quality, and their corporate ancestry. You

The post JTS: short-lived maker of 90s hard drives appeared first on The Silicon Underground.
